Author:
Andrew, Zlika This class uses the JInput Java game controller API (cf. http://java.net/projects/jinput).

setButtons

public final void setButtons()

startEventQueue

public void startEventQueue()
Start in a separate thread the processing of the controller event queue. Must be called after construction of the class to enable the processing of the joystick / gamepad events.

stopEventQueue

public void stopEventQueue()
Stop the controller event queue thread. Must be called before closing the application.
